channel.title: [pi] Ava's and skill cape problems
channel.description:
Yes i was wondering how i would changed a Ava's accumulator and skill cape not to be weapon. When you put skill cape on it goes to your weapon not your cape same with Ava's accumulator. and folder where i would find.
i have a pi source with pi client (sagi-x) PLEASE TELL ME HOW TO CHANGE ITEMS TO CAPE NOT WEAPONS.

item.title: [pi] Ava's and skill cape problems
item.dc:creator: @Damoiscool Damoiscool
item.description:
@Damoiscool wrote:

im not entirely sure but i think u go to item.java and theres stuff in there that tells u what slot it goes in so for ur ava find the item id for a working cape in ur server and put the ava id in that section if im not right tell me it may be different with pi

Read full topic
